is_open_source.title: Contract not open source
is_open_source.description: When a contract is not open source, it means its code is not publicly available, making it difficult for rug.ai to verify its integrity and reliability, potentially hiding malicious functions or bugs.
is_open_source.true_description: When a contract is not open source, it means its code is not publicly available, making it difficult for rug.ai to verify its integrity and reliability, potentially hiding malicious functions or bugs.
is_open_source.false_description: When a contract is open source, it means its code is publicly available, making it easier for rug.ai to verify its integrity and reliability.

is_proxy.title: Contract is a proxy contract
is_proxy.description: A proxy contract delegates calls to another contract (its implementation contract), making it possible to upgrade the contract, but introducing a layer of indirection and potential confusion about the ultimate source of any code execution.
is_proxy.true_description: The contract is a proxy contract.
is_proxy.false_description: The contract is not a proxy contract.

is_mintable.title: Contract has a mint function
is_mintable.description: If a contract has a mint function, it allows the creation of new tokens at the discretion of the contract controller, which could potentially dilute the token value or lead to unfair distribution.
is_mintable.true_description: The contract has a mint function.
is_mintable.false_description: The contract does not have a mint function.

owner_address.title: Contract has an owner/has not renounced ownership
owner_address.description: Ownership of a contract can provide a single entity with broad power, including the ability to modify the contract, which can lead to manipulation or misuse if the owner is not trustworthy.
owner_address.true_description: The contract has an owner and has not renounced ownership.
owner_address.false_description: The contract does not have an owner or has renounced ownership.

hidden_owner.title: Contract has a hidden owner
hidden_owner.description: This means that the true owner of the contract is obscured, potentially hiding a malicious actor who can manipulate the contract for personal gain or disrupt the token's operation.
hidden_owner.true_description: The contract has a hidden owner.
hidden_owner.false_description: The contract does not have a hidden owner.

can_take_back_ownership.title: Contract can take back ownership
can_take_back_ownership.description: If a contract can take back ownership, it means the owner can arbitrarily change the owner address, potentially leading to manipulation or misuse.
can_take_back_ownership.true_description: The contract can take back ownership.
can_take_back_ownership.false_description: The contract cannot take back ownership.

cannot_sell_all.title: Contract cannot sell all
cannot_sell_all.description: If a contract has a sell all function, it allows the sale of all tokens in a single transaction, which can be used to manipulate the token price or liquidity.
cannot_sell_all.true_description: The contract cannot sell all tokens.
cannot_sell_all.false_description: The contract can sell all tokens.

selfdestruct.title: Contract has a self-destruct OP code
selfdestruct.description: This feature allows the owner to permanently destroy the contract at any time, potentially rendering any associated tokens useless and leading to a total loss for token holders.
selfdestruct.true_description: The contract has a self-destruct OP code.
selfdestruct.false_description: The contract does not have a self-destruct OP code.

external_call.title: Contract makes external contract calls
external_call.description: When a contract makes external calls, it can introduce potential security risks, such as re-entrancy attacks, if those calls are not properly secured.
external_call.true_description: The contract makes external contract calls.
external_call.false_description: The contract does not make external contract calls.

buy_tax.title: Contract has a buy tax
buy_tax.description: A buy tax means that a percentage of tokens are deducted from each purchase and redirected, which can disincentivize buying and potentially manipulate the token's value.
buy_tax.true_description: The contract has a buy tax of $x %.
buy_tax.false_description: The contract does not have a buy tax.

sell_tax.title: Contract has a sell tax
sell_tax.description: A sell tax means that a percentage of tokens are deducted from each sale and redirected, which can disincentivize selling and potentially manipulate the token's liquidity.
sell_tax.true_description: The contract has a sell tax of $x.
sell_tax.false_description: The contract does not have a sell tax.

slippage_modifiable.title: Contract has taxes that are modifiable
slippage_modifiable.description: If taxes are modifiable, this means the token's owner can arbitrarily change the buy/sell tax rates, introducing uncertainty and potential manipulation.
slippage_modifiable.false_description: The contract does not have modifiable taxes.

personal_slippage_modifiable.title: Contract has personal taxes that are modifiable
personal_slippage_modifiable.description: If personal taxes are modifiable, this means the token's owner can arbitrarily change the buy/sell tax rates for specific addresses, introducing uncertainty and potential manipulation.
personal_slippage_modifiable.true_description: The contract has personal modifiable taxes.
personal_slippage_modifiable.false_description: The contract does not have personal modifiable taxes.

cannot_buy.title: Token cannot be bought
cannot_buy.description: If a token cannot be bought, it might be due to a malfunction or manipulation, significantly impacting its usability and value.

trading_cooldown.title: Token has a trading cooldown
trading_cooldown.description: A trading cooldown means that a certain amount of time must pass between trades, which can be used to prevent manipulation, but can also limit the token's liquidity and usability.
trading_cooldown.true_description: The token has a trading cooldown.
trading_cooldown.false_description: The token does not have a trading cooldown.

honeypot_with_same_creator.title: Token has a honeypot with the same creator
honeypot_with_same_creator.description: A honeypot token is one that appears profitable but traps users' funds, essentially acting as a scam to lure unsuspecting investors.
honeypot_with_same_creator.true_description: The token has a honeypot with the same creator.
honeypot_with_same_creator.false_description: The token does not have a honeypot with the same creator.

is_honeypot.title: Token is a honeypot
is_honeypot.description: A honeypot token is one that appears profitable but traps users' funds, essentially acting as a scam to lure unsuspecting investors.
is_honeypot.false_description: The token is not a honeypot.

transfer_pausable.title: Token transfers can be paused
transfer_pausable.description: This means the token's owner can halt any token transactions, leading to potential misuse and disruption of the token's operation.

is_blacklisted.title: Token has blacklist functionality
is_blacklisted.description: This feature enables the owner to prevent certain addresses from buying or selling the token, which can be misused for censorship or manipulation.
is_blacklisted.false_description: The token does not have blacklist functionality.

is_whitelisted.title: Token has whitelist functionality
is_whitelisted.description: Whitelisting allows only approved addresses to interact with the token, potentially restricting its accessibility and use.
is_whitelisted.false_description: The token does not have whitelist functionality.

anti_whale_modifiable.title: Token has anti-whale functionality
anti_whale_modifiable.description: This limits the amount of tokens a single address can hold or trade, aiming to prevent manipulation by large holders (whales), but can limit potential growth or use of the token.
anti_whale_modifiable.false_description: The token does not have anti-whale functionality.
